Description: Limestone ostracon: with remains of two vertical registers of black-painted hieroglyphs on one side, containing phrases from a well-known offering formula, with red dots at irregular intervals across surface.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: S. Birch, 'Inscriptions in the Hieratic and Demotic Character, from the Collections of the British Museum' (London, 1868), pl. VII.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (389926) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/389926)
